gate.creole.annic.apache.lucene.index

Class CompoundFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.annic.apache.lucene.store.Directory
      • gate.creole.annic.apache.lucene.index.CompoundFileReader

  •  class CompoundFileReader
extends Directory
    Class for accessing a compound stream. This class implements a directory, but is limited to only read operations. Directory methods that would normally modify data throw an exception.
    Version:
    $Id: CompoundFileReader.java 529 2004-10-05 11:55:26Z niraj $
    Author:
    Dmitry Serebrennikov

      (package private) static class  CompoundFileReader.CSInputStream
      Implementation of an InputStream that reads from a portion of the compound file.
      private static class  CompoundFileReader.FileEntry
